Patients stratify accord transplantation type response ( allogeneic HCT acute chronic GVHD v allogeneic HCT acute chronic GVHD vs autologous HCT ) patient age ( ≥ 60 year vs < 60 year ) . Healthy participant receive vaccine immunize influenza A serotypes specific influenza season 2007-2008 .
